text: A Long Way from Your Heart is the fifth studio album by American country band Turnpike Troubadours. It was released on October 20, 2017 through Bossier City Records. ==Accolades== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Publication ! Accolade ! title: A Long Way from Your Heart
